If you play Team Fortress 2, it's definately a step back. However if you are like me and you don't have a good gaming PC, this game is perfect if you like Team Fortress 2. The grapics are lower quality, but they take up less space and are more friendly to those that are still using DSL. If you like shooters and have a terrible computer and internet connection, this may be the perfect game for you. If you are able to play Team Fortress 2, I reccomend staying away from this game since it costs money and Team Fortress 2 is free.

I can't really recommend it.
As fun as it is, it's old and few people play it. Even if you do find a server with people in it, they are all better than you.

http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198056186683/recommended/440

This game isn't worth 0.99 let alont 3.99. I hope you don't have a pair of rose colored earbuds to go with those rose tinted goggles because if you do then I hate having to be the one to break this to you. The original Team Fortress sucked! Street Fighter 1 anyone? Oh yeah no one has played it either or ever should for that matter. Wow that was harsh. While not as bad as Street Fighter 1 it's hard to say it's worth playing (Especially in 2016) and to be honest I can't even say that I can see what could have made it a good game to begin with. You may say that it's inovative as it was a teamwork focused hero shooter way before Team Fortress 2 made it cool but even if the original did it first it also did it worst. I recall playing this more than a decade ago when it was bundled with Half-Life and a retail version of Counter Strike. Two out of those three games were awesome. Guess which one wasn't? The gunplay is awful, the maps are bad, the balance is nonexistant and the graphics even for it's time are just awful with no appeal what so ever unless you like the color brown and generic Quake wannabes. It has aged terribly and it about as much fun as playing Miscreated or Street Fighter 1. Stay away and play Team Fortress 2 instead.

Сначала я играл в классический TF2. Решил попробывать сыграть в ретро версию, и несмотря на отсутствие популярности и актуальности, это старый добрый source 1. Игра похожа на CS 1.5, только выглядит круче. Множество персонажей (все те же что и в TF2), дополнительные способности у каждого (практически). Интересно было посмотреть как этот Deathmatch появился. Режимы: самый популярный - захват флага. Если не играли в Team Fortress Classic стоит преобрести, понравится больше чем шляпная версия 2.0.

This game is a very good representation of the original FPS games out there. First, this game was a Quake mod and then developed to it's own game, leaving us Team Fortress Classic. This game has all the thrill of games like Deathmatch Classic, Counter Strike, and Quake. The diversity of the classes is what makes this game the most fun. Instead of having to worry about overpowered weapons, this game is completely equal because everyone has the stock weapons, period. I purchased this game to see what came before the game, Team Fortress 2, in which I play frequently. This game is an all-around classic and is one of the best FPS games i've played, dispite it's age. Pretty much as long as you are into First Person Shooters or games like that, you'll enjoy this one. On the downside, Valve doesn't actually have official servers like they do in Counter Strike: Global Offensive or Team Fortress 2, and are all Third Party Community Servers, but as long as you find a good server, that's all that matters. If you are apprehensive of purchasing this because of the graphics, don't be. It's like that because it's old, and remember that the gameplay makes up for it. I promise you, as long as you keep playing and don't give up you'll like it. It may take you a few hours to get as good as you are at other FPS games, because at the beginning, you're not going to be so hot. One thing for TF2 players, there isn't hats or any way to waste your money. So just remember that one purchase is it. Anyway, as long as you are open minded to trying this game out, you should enjoy this game very much.

This game isn't like Team Fortress 2. Let's just be clear on that matter.

It is hard to find a server since well this is a "newer" version of the classic TF game. What you know about the Team Fortress games are still the same. Work with other players and defeat the opposing team, with each and unqiue class that is design to fit you. Sure that may say a lot of a game like this. But either way, this game is much as fun as the secondary installment of the Team Fortress game, only that one is a bit more cartooney. This one works with the Half Life models that are dotted throughout the Half games and are specifically design to suit the class.

If you want pure mulitplayer nostaglia. Get this game today!
I played 10 minutes and my wallets not empty. 10/10

A perspective from a 500 hour TF2 player: 

This game is interesting. That's the word I would use to describe it. It hasn't aged the greatest, though.

Story: Doesn't need one.
Graphics: Quite good for 1999, Actually. The textures are bland, but quite detailed for when this was made. 
Gameplay: It appears TF2 significantly streamlined the experince. The gameplay isn't bad at all, but it's very unintivutive.
Grenades: It has. 

Overall. you have to appreciate it as a product of it's time. I would give it a 8/10.
I find this more fun than TF2 but still would choose TF2.

Конечно, время берёт своё  - игра сильно устарела, но это не мешает ей оставаться интересной и динамичной. В этой игре много различных классов бойцов и каждый сможет найти класс на свой вкус. Множество оружия, множество разнообразных карт и ураганный игровой процесс  - всё это вы сможете найти в этой игре. Единственный минус - это маленькое количество игроков, но найти сервер с достаточным количеством игроков вполне реально. Я приятно провёл время в этой игрушке. Все кто когда-то пропустил эту игру, могут в любое время посмотреть на настоящий классический шутер от первого лица. Но ради этого покупать отдельно игру не стоит, лучше взять сборник Half-Life: Complete. Так вы сэкономите денег и поиграете в другие интересные игры, входящие в состав данного комплекта. Рекомендую!

I've always been a sucker for old games, especially old 90s games. I didn't exist then but the games will stay as a reminder of how fps games came to be. Although it's not as popular as current games and most servers are practically nonexistent, you'll find some really cool servers. If you've played Team Fortress 2, some of the maps are the same just with lower graphics and a completely different look.
Valve, you certainly did really well with this game when it first came out. Good job!
One of the best 90s games you can still buy. :)

Like TF2 but not free.

10/10

I haven't played TFC in a long time. It used to consume my time back in the day and is starting to do so again, today. This game is still worth the little price to buy. The servers aren't dead and the original gameplay and style remain intact. I'm very suprised at the negative comments and that users say the game is dead. If you want a game that has stuck around even through the modding of TF2, here it is. No in game buying and you get the same thing as everyone else. It's skill based instead of item based and it makes this game worth playing, even after all of these years.
on hauska ja classinen

OHHHHHHH MAN, this game was GREAT back in the day! Could spend hours on the countless servers. Best thing ever was rushing into the enemy base as a medic and infecting everyone with the contagious disease, starting with the HWG and the sniper. :D

Most recent few times I tried to play, though (after the years had passed), the only servers I found were mostly populated with bots, and most of those servers had all kinds of fancy mods that kinda cluttered the gameplay. The bots had outstandingly great AI and played very much like real people, but still, it wasn't the same as it used to be.

Still, a classic, especially if you can get a large group of friends and/or regular players together.

Team Fortress Classic ist zwar für die Heutige Zeit veraltet aber ich kann dieses Spiel nur Leuten empfehlen denen es nichts ausmacht mit einer sehr (mild-ausgedrückt) alten Grafik zu spielen.

Sonst ist Team Fortress Classic wie Team Fortress 2 (abgesehen von der Grafik,dem allgemeinem Spieldesign, der Ausrüstung und der Tatsache das man keine neuen Waffen/Kleidung verdienen kann).

Also könnte man sagen, dass ich das Spiel deswegen empfehle.
